code: import{apiFetch}from"./client";export function fetchComplaints(){let filters=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};const params=new URLSearchParams(filters).toString();return apiFetch("/api/complaints".concat(params?"?".concat(params):""));}export function createComplaint(payload){return apiFetch("/api/complaints",{method:"POST",body:JSON.stringify(payload)});}export function assignWorkerToComplaint(id,worker_id){return apiFetch("/api/complaints/".concat(id,"/assign"),{method:"PATCH",body:JSON.stringify({worker_id})});}export function updateComplaintStatus(id,status){return apiFetch("/api/complaints/".concat(id,"/status"),{method:"PATCH",body:JSON.stringify({status})});}export function closeComplaint(id){return apiFetch("/api/complaints/".concat(id,"/close"),{method:"PATCH"});}
